title: CHEATERS in Team Fight Tactics??? Really????? In a RNG economy game -.- Grave's AOE +debuff items:D
body: Load screen's frozen 3-5 times per 3 matches now until I gave up in the third match where it got stuck at 5% load for 10 minutes, only 1 match let me reconnect and play, anybody else gotten this??? It's almost like somebody doesn't like me putting debuff items or mass ad with ie on Grave's aoe spray + turning him into a megachine gun with combining other traits, I haven't' tried demon trait yet.

replies.body: What does you having a bad PC have to do with cheaters?
lame boat fake accounts throwing 5vs3s and trolls accusing of cheats just because I dodge 89% of skill shots average when there's no throwers
